MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH64 postcode area of Neston, affecting properties in The Village, The Rake and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:41pm. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 11pm and we expect the power to be restored by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:01pm on 21st April 2021
